passwords.no_token: Deze pagina is alleen bereikbaar via een wachtwoord reset e-mail. Als je wel via een wachtwoord reset email komt, zorg er dan voor dat je de volledige URL gebruikt.

passwords.updated_not_active: Je wachtwoord werd met succes gewijzigd.

registrations.destroyed: Je account is verwijderd, wellicht tot ziens!
registrations.signed_up_but_inactive: Je bent ingeschreven, maar we konden je niet inloggen omdat je account nog niet is geactiveerd.
registrations.signed_up_but_locked: Je bent ingeschreven, maar we konden je niet inloggen omdat je account is gelocked.

unlocks.send_instructions: Je ontvangt via e-mail instructies hoe je je account kan unlocken.
unlocks.send_paranoid_instructions: Als we je e-mail adres terugvinden in onze database, zal je binnen enkele ogenblikken via e-mail, de instructies ontvangen hoe je je account kan unlocken.
unlocks.unlocked: Je account is ge-unlocked. Je kan nu weer inloggen.

messages.invalid_request: The request is missing a required parameter, includes an unsupported parameter value, or is otherwise malformed.
messages.invalid_redirect_uri: The redirect uri included is not valid.
messages.unauthorized_client: The client is not authorized to perform this request using this method.
messages.access_denied: The resource owner or authorization server denied the request.
messages.invalid_scope: The requested scope is invalid, unknown, or malformed.
messages.server_error: The authorization server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request.
messages.temporarily_unavailable: The authorization server is currently unable to handle the request due to a temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.
messages.credential_flow_not_configured: Resource Owner Password Credentials flow failed due to Doorkeeper.configure.resource_owner_from_credentials being unconfigured.
messages.resource_owner_authenticator_not_configu: Resource Owner find failed due to Doorkeeper.configure.resource_owner_authenticator being unconfiged.
messages.unsupported_response_type: The authorization server does not support this response type.
messages.invalid_client: Client authentication failed due to unknown client, no client authentication included, or unsupported authentication method.
messages.invalid_grant: The provided authorization grant is invalid, expired, revoked, does not match the redirection URI used in the authorization request, or was issued to another client.
messages.unsupported_grant_type: The authorization grant type is not supported by the authorization server.
messages.invalid_resource_owner: The provided resource owner credentials are not valid, or resource owner cannot be found
